description: Small timer application. It will remember your last time. You can close the app after starting the countdown and you will be informed when the timer is down to 0 with the chosen notification method. --- 0.7.1  - Ringtone Alarm can be stopped by closing the app or tapping a button in the new dashboard - Alarm notification via dashboard, if the timer has been closed before, your current app won't be disturbed when the alarm comes up - you can tap at the time position to jump directly to the minute or second input without having to tap the zero button many times
